review: While Dr Nandini is very senior the way she talks and treats patients ** ** ** **** *** **** **** ****** *** *** ** *** **** *** ** ********* *** *** ***** *** ******** ** ** *** ** **** No patience at all. Very demotivating talks. **** ****** **** **** * ****** ******** **** **** ***** **** ***** ******** Don't even care to check the facts.*** *************** ** ***** ** *** ********* *** ******* **** *** ** ****** * * **** *** **** When we ask a few questions she feels offended or like we are doubting her skills. ***** **** **** * ***** ** * **** She is not bothered even if the kid is crying. *** *** * ****** ** ***** ***** *** ** ****** **** **** ** *** ***** ** ** **** *** ***** ** ******* *** ******* Never recommend her to anyone** **** **** **** *** **** *** ******* ********** *** ******* ****** *** ******* **** ** *** **** **** ** *** ****** ****** *** ******* *** *** ******* ******* I*** **** *** ******** **** **** *** ******** **** Apparently we have to adjust the timings of the baby according to their schedule. As per my experience with her... She has no patience to explain things. De Motivation talk to parents who are already worried .  No positive vibe
